title: Configuration
subtitle: Learn how to configure your bot.

tips.title: Extensions
tips.description: Register extensions and configure the bundled ones.

tips.title: Internationalization (i18n)
tips.description: Configure how your bot should handle different locales and languages.

data.title: About
data.description: Configure information about your bot, to be displayed on Discord.

data.title: Commands
data.description: Configure the application and chat command frameworks.

data.title: Error Responses
data.description: Configure how errors are displayed to users on Discord.

data.title: Hooks
data.description: Configure blocks of code to be run at various points in the bot's lifecycle.

data.title: Intents
data.description: Configure which events and data Discord will provide your bot with.

data.title: Presence
data.description: Configure the bot's initial presence, which is set when it connects to Discord.

data.title: Components
data.description: Swap out the default component registry for another implementation.

data.title: Data Adapter
data.description: Swap out the default data adapter for another implementation.

data.title: Kord Customization
data.description: Customize the Kord instance underpinning your bot.

data.title: Members
data.description: Configure whether and how guild members are retrieved.
